lead_paragraph: From the toy sailboats he made as a boy to the large-scale installations he’s overseen in his career, the art world curator credits his rural childhood for sharpening his keen aesthetic.
snippet: From the toy sailboats he made as a boy to the large-scale installations he’s overseen in his career, the art world curator credits his rural childhood for sharpening his keen aesthetic.
abstract: Profile of art world curator Neville Wakefield, told through annotated personal photos.
